TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SqlBulkCopyColumnMapping extends System.Object

summary.span: 定义 实例的数据源中的列与该实例的目标表中的列之间的映射。

span.span: Defines the mapping between a column in a instance's data source and a column in the instance's destination table.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列映射定义数据源和目标表之间的映射。Column mappings define the mapping between data source and the target table. 如果未定义映射 — 即集合为空-序号位置上的列将映射隐式基于。If mappings are not defined—that is, the collection is empty—the columns are mapped implicitly based on ordinal position. 对于这种方式，源和目标架构必须与匹配。For this to work, source and target schemas must match. 如果不是这样，将引发。If they do not, an will be thrown. 如果集合不为空的不是每个数据源中存在的列必须指定。If the collection is not empty, not every column present in the data source has to be specified. 未映射的集合那些将被忽略。Those not mapped by the collection are ignored. 你可以按名称或序号引用源和目标列。You can refer to source and target columns by either name or ordinal. 你还可以混合使用按名称和相同的映射集合中的第几列引用。You can also mix by-name and by-ordinal column references in the same mappings collection. ## Examples 下面的示例大容量复制数据从源表中**AdventureWorks**到同一个数据库中的目标表的示例数据库。The following example bulk copies data from a source table in the **AdventureWorks** sample database to a destination table in the same database. 尽管目标中的列数匹配的源中的列数并且在其相应的源列相同的序号位置是每个目标列，列名称不匹配。Although the number of columns in the destination matches the number of columns in the source, and each destination column is in the same ordinal position as its corresponding source column, the column names do not match. 对象用于创建大容量复制的列映射。 objects are used to create a column map for the bulk copy. > [!IMPORTANT] > 除非你已创建了工作表中所述，将不会运行此示例[批量复制示例设置](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 提供此代码是为了演示使用的语法**SqlBulkCopy**仅。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果源和目标表都在相同的 SQL Server 实例，它将更加容易和快速使用 Transact SQL`INSERT … SELECT`语句复制数据。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMapping#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMapping/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMapping#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMapping/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 用于初始化新的 对象的默认构造函数。

span.span: Default constructor that initializes a new object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你使用此构造函数，你必须定义映射使用源属性或属性，并定义映射使用目标属性或属性。If you use this constructor, you must then define the source for the mapping using the property or the property, and define the destination for the mapping using the property or the property. ## Examples 下面的示例大容量复制数据从源表中**AdventureWorks**到同一个数据库中的目标表的示例数据库。The following example bulk copies data from a source table in the **AdventureWorks** sample database to a destination table in the same database. 尽管目标中的列数与匹配的源中的列数，但不匹配的列名称和序号位置。Although the number of columns in the destination matches the number of columns in the source, the column names and ordinal positions do not match. 对象用于创建大容量复制的列映射。 objects are used to create a column map for the bulk copy. > [!IMPORTANT] > 除非你已创建了工作表中所述，将不会运行此示例[批量复制示例设置](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 提供此代码是为了演示使用的语法**SqlBulkCopy**仅。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果源和目标表都在相同的 SQL Server 实例，它将更加容易和快速使用 Transact SQL`INSERT … SELECT`语句复制数据。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMapping#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMapping/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMapping#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMapping/VB/source.vb#1)]

Public Sub New (sourceColumnOrdinal As Integer, destinationOrdinal As Integer)

param.name: sourceColumnOrdinal
param.span: 数据源中源列的序号位置。

span.span: The ordinal position of the source column within the data source.

param.name: destinationOrdinal
param.span: 目标表中目标列的序号位置。

span.span: The ordinal position of the destination column within the destination table.

summary.span: 创建新的列映射，并使用列序号引用源列和目标列。

span.span: Creates a new column mapping, using column ordinals to refer to source and destination columns.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例大容量复制数据从源表中**AdventureWorks**到同一个数据库中的目标表的示例数据库。The following example bulk copies data from a source table in the **AdventureWorks** sample database to a destination table in the same database. 尽管目标中的列数与匹配的源中的列数，但不匹配的列名称和序号位置。Although the number of columns in the destination matches the number of columns in the source, the column names and ordinal positions do not match. 对象用于创建基于列的序号位置大容量复制的列映射。 objects are used to create a column map for the bulk copy based on the ordinal positions of the columns. > [!IMPORTANT] > 除非你已创建了工作表中所述，将不会运行此示例[批量复制示例设置](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 提供此代码是为了演示使用的语法**SqlBulkCopy**仅。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果源和目标表都在相同的 SQL Server 实例，它将更加容易和快速使用 Transact SQL`INSERT … SELECT`语句复制数据。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingOrdinal#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingOrdinal/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingOrdinal#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingOrdinal/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 创建新的列映射，并使用列序号引用源列和目标列的列名称。

span.span: Creates a new column mapping, using a column ordinal to refer to the source column and a column name for the target column.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DestinationColumn { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 正在目标数据库表中映射的列的名称。

span.span: Name of the column being mapped in the destination database table.
The string value of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和属性是互相排斥。The and properties are mutually exclusive. 最后一个的值设置优先。The last value set takes precedence. ## Examples 下面的示例大容量复制数据从源表中**AdventureWorks**到同一个数据库中的目标表的示例数据库。The following example bulk copies data from a source table in the **AdventureWorks** sample database to a destination table in the same database. 尽管目标中的列数与匹配的源中的列数，但不匹配的列名称和序号位置。Although the number of columns in the destination matches the number of columns in the source, the column names and ordinal positions do not match. 对象用于创建大容量复制的列映射。 objects are used to create a column map for the bulk copy. > [!IMPORTANT] > 除非你已创建了工作表中所述，将不会运行此示例[批量复制示例设置](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 提供此代码是为了演示使用的语法**SqlBulkCopy**仅。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果源和目标表都在相同的 SQL Server 实例，它将更加容易和快速使用 Transact SQL`INSERT … SELECT`语句复制数据。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingDestinationColumn#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingDestinationColumn/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingDestinationColumn#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingDestinationColumn/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int DestinationOrdinal { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 目标表中目标列的序号值。

span.span: Ordinal value of the destination column within the destination table.

value.span: 属性的整数值，或者如果尚未设置该属性，则为 -1。

span.span: The integer value of the property, or -1 if the property has not been set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和属性是互相排斥。The and properties are mutually exclusive. 最后一个的值设置优先。The last value set takes precedence. ## Examples 下面的示例大容量复制数据从源表中**AdventureWorks**到同一个数据库中的目标表的示例数据库。The following example bulk copies data from a source table in the **AdventureWorks** sample database to a destination table in the same database. 尽管目标中的列数与匹配的源中的列数，但不匹配的列名称和序号位置。Although the number of columns in the destination matches the number of columns in the source, the column names and ordinal positions do not match. 对象用于创建大容量复制的列映射。 objects are used to create a column map for the bulk copy. > [!IMPORTANT] > 除非你已创建了工作表中所述，将不会运行此示例[批量复制示例设置](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 提供此代码是为了演示使用的语法**SqlBulkCopy**仅。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果源和目标表都在相同的 SQL Server 实例，它将更加容易和快速使用 Transact SQL`INSERT … SELECT`语句复制数据。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data.
